title: Trump says DACA deal for young immigrants is off
text:
Trump says DACA deal for young immigrants is off 12:10am BST - 01:26 
President Donald Trump took to Twitter on Easter Sunday, threatening to cancel any potential deal with Democrats to protect the legal status of so-called 'Dreamer' immigrants, and warned Mexico he could end NAFTA if they don't help with border security.   
President Donald Trump took to Twitter on Easter Sunday, threatening to cancel any potential deal with Democrats to protect the legal status of so-called 'Dreamer' immigrants, and warned Mexico he could end NAFTA if they don't help with border security.  //reut.rs/2H4Es08
